dmca.title: [EV1-C1516387S] harmful content at http://www.forumcpanel.com.br/index.php?showtopic=
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 7:04 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1516387S] harmful content at http://www.forumcpanel.com.br/index.php?showtopic=1304&hl=lucianoluis / 70.84.187.18 Subject: [EV1-C1516387S] harmful content at http://www.forumcpanel.com.br/index.php?showtopic=1304&hl=lucianoluis / 70.84.187.18 ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. harmful content at http://www.forumcpanel.com.br/index.php?showtopic=1304&hl=lucianoluis / 70.84.187.18 Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 25 2006 03:57 am X-MailFrom: itamar@ispbrasil.com.br X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed, 25 Oct 2006 01:05:54 -0500 Received: (qmail 28316 invoked by uid 0); 25 Oct 2006 06:05:58 -0000 Received: by simscan 1.2.0 ppid: 28309, pid: 28312, t: 12.1560s scanners: regex: 1.2.0 attach: 1.2.0 clamav: 0.88.5/m:40/d:2087 Received: from unknown (HELO ispbrasil) (itamar@ispbrasil.com.br@200.233.139.207) by server.ispbrasil.com.br with ESMTPA; 25 Oct 2006 06:05:46 -0000 Message-ID: <001101c6f7fb$83d16cf0$0a00000a@ispbrasil> From: "Itamar Reis Peixoto" To: Subject: harmful content at http://www.forumcpanel.com.br/index.php?showtopic=1304&hl=lucianoluis / 70.84.187.18 Date: Wed, 25 Oct 2006 03:04:55 -0300 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_000C_01C6F7E2.58E41510" X-Priority: 1 X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2180 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of ispbrasil.com.br designates 209.67.213.238 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.67.213.238; MIME element (text/plain) harmful content at http://www.forumcpanel.com.br/index.php?showtopic=1304&hl=lucianoluis / 70.84.187.18 this website is hosting a harmful content about my company. have contacted them about this problem , but the responsible of this website was refusing to remove this content about my company. I need to know how to get this page removed Can you help-me ? -------------------- Itamar Reis Peixoto e-mail: itamar@ispbrasil.com.br msn: itamarjp@starmedia.com skype: itamarjp icq: 81053601 +55 34 3238 3845 +55 11 4063 5033 MIME element (text/html)
